track.name: Forever Loving Jah
comments: This song is too powerful for words...
I can't believe that this my first time leaving a shout for this song!? Amazing, I get chills when I hear it! I am sure your son at thirty minutes on this earth was in paradise :) musicgodlything.
I played this to my son when he was 30 minutes old.
nice song, love the riddim more..
Yes my brothers and sisters, another anthem and reminder from the Sheppard of the flock. It’s good to have a little gospel of Jah spread through the leaven. Praise!
jah.. rastfari, ever living, ever faithful, ever sure, selassi i the fist
find the reason in every season.... well said uncle bob

Siempre lo amaremos Señor de Señore.s.........

La verdad tiene que llegar
Agreed, this is a great track;lyrics, feeling, production, and damn, the keys in this song are so great.
More shouts needed on this track.......... We won't worry, we won't shed no tears... Jah will see us thru' always.......... Love this track........ Vital.......... Bless Up

We'll be forever loving Jah........ Creator of the Universe........ Guide and protector, forever...  yes and forever. No matter what stages they put us thru'... Jah will always be there........... Rastafari......... Only a fool leans upon his own understanding........ Trust in the almighty always to guide and protect........ One Love
FOREVER AND EVER,LOVING JAH~~~!!!!!!!!! POSITIVE. COSTA RICA,IRIE!!!!!!!1
